deity.name: The Song of Silence
deity.description: Philosophy of the perfection of undeath

skills.list_mods: Acrobatics +18, Athletics +17, Engineering +15, Intimidate +3, Medicine +15, Piloting +19, Survival +13

feat.name: Barricade
feat.description: You are adept at creating quick, temporary cover.

feat.name: Bodyguard
feat.description: You can attempt to ward off attacks that target nearby allies.

feat.name: Deadly Aim
feat.description: Your can strike your enemies' weak points and deal more damage.

feat.name: Deflect Projectiles
feat.description: You can use your melee weapon to deflect attacks.

feat.name: Dive for Cover
feat.description: You know how to dive out of the area of an effect.

feat.name: Extra Resolve
feat.description: Your resolve is stronger than most.

feat.name: In Harm's Way
feat.description: You put yourself in danger's path to save your allies.

feat.name: Mobility
feat.description: You can easily move past dangerous foes.

feat.name: Quick Draw
feat.description: You can draw weapons faster than most.

feat.name: Shot on the Run
feat.description: You can move, fire a ranged weapon, and move again before your foes can react.

feat.name: Opening Volley
feat.description: Your ranged assault leaves your foe disoriented and vulnerable to your next melee attack.

ability_object.name: +2 Strength
